FULL RESUME:
HARSH ARORA DOB: 28/05/2004 | E-mail: harsh.22087@sscbs.du.ac.in | Phone: +91 96 250 68 100
Address: F-8/52, Sector-15, Rohini, New Delhi – 110089 | LinkedIn
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS
Course/Examination Institution/University Year of Passing Performance
Shaheed SukhdevCollege of Business Studies 8.86 CGPA
Bachelor of Management Studies Pursuing
(University of Delhi) (Till 2ndSemester)
AISSCE (Commerce) AadharshilaVidyapeeth (Delhi) 2022 96.8% [484/500]
AISSE AadharshilaVidyapeeth (Delhi) 2020 93.8% [469/500]
Fundamental Analysis ZerodhaVarsity 2023 100% [150/150]
TECHNICAL SKILLS: Microsoft Suite (Advanced Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Access), Python, SPSS, Power BI, Canva
INTERNSHIPS
Ogilvy & Mather Pvt. Ltd. – Strategy and Planning Intern [7 weeks, January – February 2024]
o Executed intricate research by incorporating moment marketing, trend jacking, & strategic analysis to facilitate client pitching for
5+ MNCs, resulting in profound amplification of brand visibility; Catalyzing substantial impact on market penetration & expansion
o Onboarded global brands like Marks & Spencer's, Induslnd Bank, Durex, Dabur, ENO; Leveraged baseline research across 7+
platforms devising strategies to seize multifaceted opportunities; Engaged with cross-functional teams to translate ideas to actions
Genpreneur Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (Evolve) – Finance Research Intern [7 weeks, August – September 2023]
o Extensively explored various financial concepts like Taxes, Insurance, Budgeting, Financial Planning, ETF, Bonds, FOREX and more
o Developed 6+ modules which contributed in enhancing their mobile application and learned systems and software management
o Refined techniques of researching and streamlining user experience by creating user-oriented content and driving engagement
Mindler – Student Intern [5 weeks, January – February 2022]
o Worked as a student intern in the domain of Entrepreneurship & Skill Development over the course of Mindler Internship
Program; successfully completed all the assignments and tasks related to the project on a timely basis
o Selected from amongst 30,000 students to be one of Mindler’s Top 1,000 in Mindler Scholarship & Talent Hunt and was granted
the scholarship from SRM University in the career domain of Management & Entrepreneurship
PROJECTS UNDERTAKEN
Green Technology for CO Reduction – Sustainable Future Solutions Pvt. Ltd. (Project Appraisal, Financing & Control)
2
o Critiqued an Economical Appraisal for the company dedicated to reducing carbon emissions for corporations. Analyzed revenue
models, including consultancy fees, product sales, tool subscriptions, and offset sales, while addressing key economic risks
o Conducted the Managerial Appraisal, assessing the company’s USP, technology-driven approach, and scalability. Identified areas
for improvement, like market awareness, financial viability etc, contributing to company’s overarching Sustainability Objectives
Meteorological Insights: Predictive Modeling for Temperature (Introduction to Business Analytics)
o Pioneered development of temperature prediction model, addressing ethics, contributing nuanced insights into climatic systems
o Orchestrated regression model construction, applying advanced analytics for intricate meteorological relationships and projection
o Integrated analytics for precise weather forecasting, emphasizing utility in understanding complex weather phenomena
Business Proposal – Sarvgun Sampann (Economics of Startups)
o Crafted Intermediary model of an app connecting vocational skill providers & learners, imparting essential skills and employment
o Presented a concise Business Model Canvas with Q1 financials and marketing strategy outlining features like affordable
equipment, flexible training hours, and secure relationships, empowering service professionals and creating new income streams
AWARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS
Scored a Perfect 10/10 Grade point in 4 subjects till 2nd Semester
National Winner – Masters’ Union School of Business | Hult Prize x BIMTECH (On Campus Event) | Cash prize of INR 30,000 [2024]
National Winner – Rewind 2023, NIT Calicut | Sawaal Jawaab, LSR | Phoenix Pitch, SGGSCC | Zeitgeist 2.0, Aryabhatta College [2023]
National Winner – Ranneeti 5.0 – Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies, University of Delhi | Cash price of INR 1,500 [2023]
National Rank-3 – Finatic’23 – St. Stephen’s College, University of Delhi | Participation of 1000+ teams [2023]
National Rank-4 – 6 Degrees, IIM Tiruchirappalli | Market Odyssey, MLNEC | MindCraft, MLNEC | Participation of 1700+ teams [2024]
National Rank-5 – Treasure Trove’24 – Delhi School of Economics | Participation of 300+ teams [2024]
National Finalist (Top 6) – Strategix 3.0 – Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology | Participation of 1500+ teams [2023]
National Finalist (Top 8) – Quriozity – Keshav Mahavidyalaya, University of Delhi | Participation of 100+ teams [2023]
National Finalist (Top 10) – Restart-Up, FMS | Quizathlon, IIM B | ArthNeeti 3.0, IIM Nagpur | Case-Orion, Gargi College [2023]
POSITIONS OF RESPONSIBILITY
Coordinator (Kartavya, the Social Service Forum & NSS Unit of Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies) [July 2023 – Present]
o Spearheaded a team of 60+ to organize VITI – the Diwali Fest and VIVANTE – the Philanthropic Event, partnered with prominent
companies – SEED Global, Amul, Drishti IAS, Career Launcher, yielding a revenue of INR 1,00,000+ and an impressive 7.5k+ footfall
o Executed a Social Case Study Competition with 200+ participants; allied with AMFI, SEBI, FIAPO, and ILBS for awareness sessions on
varied domains. Collaborated with Scope for Change NGO for 5 months, educating and upskilling 60+ children and 20+ women
o Guided critical initiatives Muskaan & Furry; Co-founded Project Saksham, impacting 700+ underprivileged individuals; led a team
of 50+ for the DU’s Valedictory Ceremony graced by the presence of the Honorable Prime Minister and other esteemed dignitaries
Corporate Relations Head (Communiqué, the Public Relations Cell of Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies) [July 2023 – Present]
o Successfully managed the 16th iteration of the Annual Management and Business Conclave – Prodigy, known for its outreach of
4000+ students from 900+ schools; 2023 witnessed extensive participation, with participants from Singapore and Bahrain
o Procured partnerships with Pratham Test Prep, Bikanervala, Spesh, Duolingo, and D’Finite; generating revenue of INR 1,50,000;
additionally enabled creation of Excel models for Simulation, Mock Stock, and design of Market Entry Case in Concept Department
OTHER INTERESTS AND ACTIVITIES
Interested in NSS, coordinated with 300+ volunteers for Viksit Bharat Campaign; executed 35+ campaigns including Blood Donation
camps, Cleanliness drives, and a Food Donation drive collecting 240KGs of food; Hobbies include playing Badminton and watching movies
Career Development Centre | Shaheed Sukhdev College of Business Studies | PSP Area – IV, Dr. K.N. Katju Marg, Sector 16, Rohini, Delhi - 110089
